Extension.name: psoBase64
Extension.initParam: PSO Base64 coder/decoder. Handles some extended functions not available in the system class

Extension.name: psoObjectFinder
Extension.initParam: PSO Object finder. Finds legacy objects for this item.

Extension.name: psoWorkflowActionDispatcher
Extension.initParam: This dispatches multiple Workflow Actions on a single transition. The configuration is in a properties file.

Extension.name: psoSpringWorkflowActionDispatcher
Extension.initParam: This dispatches multiple Workflow Actions on a single transition. The configuration is in a Spring bean.

Extension.name: PSONextNumberUdf
Extension.initParam: Generate the next number for a key

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: keyName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Next Number Table Key Name

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: expression
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: JEXL expression or script to execute.

Extension.name: sys_previewFilter
Extension.initParam: Items revisions are filtered to select the current or edit revisions of items

Extension.name: sys_publicFilter
Extension.initParam: Items revisions are filtered to select the public revision of items

Extension.name: PSOStagingRevisionFilter
Extension.initParam: Filter rule that corrects the revision of items in staging states.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: workflow_states
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Names of states where current revision is used, comma separated

Extension.name: PSOPublishContent
Extension.initParam: This exit allows an edition to be run on a workflow transition.

Extension.name: PSOThumbnailGenerator
Extension.initParam: Automatically generates the thumbnail for the uploaded full image./

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: MaxDimension
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Max dimension must be specified unless width or height is specified

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Thumbnail_Width
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specified width for thumbnail (optional)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Thumbnail_Height
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specified height for thumbnail (optional)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UseOriginalFileFormat
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Use original file format if "yes". Otherwise JPG will be used.

Extension.name: PSORequiredFieldsItemValidation
Extension.initParam: Item Validation exit for required fields

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: FieldList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Fields to require, comma separated.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: DestinationStates
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Destination States, comma separated.

Extension.name: PSOValidateRelatedItems
Extension.initParam: Item Validation exit for related content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: QueryResource
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Not used in this version

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: TransitionID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Transition to validate, use * for all transitions

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: VariantID1
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Not used in this version

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: SlotName1
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Slot to validate

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: MustOccur1
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: MORE_THAN, LESS_THAN or EXACTLY

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Number1
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: number of items in slot

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: VariantID2
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Not used in this version

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: SlotName2
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Slot to validate

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: MustOccur2
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: MORE_THAN, LESS_THAN or EXACTLY

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Number2
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: number of items in slot

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: VariantID3
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Not used in this version

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: SlotName3
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Slot to validate

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: MustOccur3
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: MORE_THAN, LESS_THAN or EXACTLY

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Number3
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: number of items in slot

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: VariantID4
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Not used in this version

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: SlotName4
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Slot to validate

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: MustOccur4
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: MORE_THAN, LESS_THAN or EXACTLY

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: Number4
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: number of items in slot

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (required) The template to use to format the ancestor item in the folder tree. If you don't provide it will use the current assembly items template.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: contenttype
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (required) The contenttype of the ancestor item.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The template to use to format the returned items, will override the template specified by the relationship if defined. A typical use for this would be an FAQ where the same slot is rendered twice. You may specify either a name or an id.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: max_results
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The maximum number of items to return for the slot, defaults to unlimited.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: source_slot
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: the name of the slot to reverse. Null to include ALL relationships.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: order_by
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: One or more comma separated field components. Each component names a field available in the related content objects and a direction. The syntax of this mirrors that for the JSR-170 queries.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: query
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The SQL Query to execute

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The template to add to the slot

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: max_results
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The max nr of results

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: order_by
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The sort order for the results

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: mayHaveCrossSiteLinks
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: If true will add siteid for items found. Will pick first site found for item.

Extension.name: PSOProxyQueryResource
Extension.initParam: This exit allows you to make internal request to external resource that produce XML.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: url
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (required) The url call.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: user
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (optional) The user name if authentication is required.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: password
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (optional) The password if authentication is required.

Extension.name: PSOFileUploadValidation
Extension.initParam: This UDF can be use to limit the size and/or restrict the MIME type of files being uploaded into Percussion CMS using the sys_File control.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: the name attribute of the PSXField that is mapped to a sys_File control. Cannot be null.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: maxSize
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: the maximum allowed file size (in bytes); a value of (-1) means unlimited.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: mimeTypes
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: comma-separated list of allowed Mime types, e.g., text/html, image/jpeg, etc.

Extension.name: PSOUniqueFieldWithInFolders
Extension.initParam: Determines whether a field is unique for an item within the folders it resides.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: value
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Value

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (Optional, default = fieldname) The name of the field providing the value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: excludePromotableVersions
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (Optional, default = false) If True, suppress this validation for items that are promotable versions of another item.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: checkPaths
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (Optional) If set will check uniqueness in each comma separated path/Site e.g. //Sites/SiteA/%,//Sites/SiteB/%

Extension.name: PSFolderFollowerEffect
Extension.initParam: Moves the dependent item to the owners folders.

Extension.name: PSFolderOwnerSubfolderEffect
Extension.initParam: Adds the dependent item to a subfolder of the owners folders.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: subfolderPath
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Relative path to the subfolder.

Extension.name: PSODateAdjust
Extension.initParam: Adjust date based on a field

Extension.name: PSODateRangeFieldValidator
Extension.initParam: Validates that a date field is within a range based another date field or the current date.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: currentField
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: value of current field to be validated

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: sourceFieldName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: name of field to validate against. Leave blank to validate against the current date.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: minDays
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: minimum days offset. Use -1 for no minimum validation.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: maxDays
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: maximum days offset. Use -1 for no maximum validation.

Extension.name: PSOUserCommunityUDF
Extension.initParam: Return the users current community name

Extension.name: PSOSetRevisionLock
Extension.initParam: Sets the Revision Lock. Once the lock has been set, it cannot be reset.

Extension.name: PSEffectLoggingEffectEffect
Extension.initParam: Moves the dependent item to the owners folders.

Extension.name: PSOPreventOnTranslatedItem
Extension.initParam: Prevents a relationship from being created on a translated item.

Extension.name: PSOPreventDeepCloneUDF
Extension.initParam: When added as a deep cloning conditional only deep clones if item is in defined list of states

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: states
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of state names to allow deep cloning

Extension.name: HashCodeFieldTransform
Extension.initParam: Return a hash code for the given parameter

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: source
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The Value to return the hashCode from.

Extension.name: pso_CopyParameter
Extension.initParam: Return a hash code for the given parameter

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: source
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: request parameter name to be copied

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: destination
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: request parameter name to receive copy

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: onlyIfEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional Do not populate if value already specified default false, turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldSize
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional truncate copied value to this number of characters

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: cleanup
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional cleanup filename turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: includesExtension
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Keep a final . for an extension. turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: forceLower
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Force to lower case. turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: doNotCopyEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Do not blank destination if source is blank. turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: stripExtension
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Do we strip any extension if exists . turn on with "true"

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: prefix
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Prefix to add to filename

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: suffix
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Suffix to add to filename before and extension

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: forceExtension
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. add or replace extension with this value, do not include'.'

Extension.name: pso_cleanupTrashTask
Extension.initParam: This is used to execute move and cleanup items using a trash folder and state Items In this folder will be forced into a trash state if they are not already. using a comma separated list of transitions to attempt. Items in a trash state will be purged after an optional number of days. This includes items not explicitly moved to the trash folder. Orphaned items will be moved into the trash folder Folder structure //Folders/{trash folder name}/{community name} will be used to split up items by folder Orphaned items will be placed into a folder based upon the date they were found //Folders/{trash folder name}/{community name}/Orphaned-20101112 sys_title of orphaned items will be appended with (1) (2) etc. if there are duplicates If more than 200 orphaned items are found for the community subfolders 1-200,201-400 etc. will be created Orphaned items will be forced into trash state when being moved Empty trash folders below the top level community folder will be removed after processing. Separate view can be made to show items with AA relationships to items in trash state so they can be manually cleaned up before automatic removal. Purging expired publishing log entries. The task result contains the following context variables, which can be used in notification template (both subject and body fields): $numberOfDays (String type, the number of days before removing items in trash state. This is specified in the parameter of the extension) $tools.* (utilities defined in tools.xml) $sys.taskName (String type, the name of the task) $sys.completed (Boolean type, it is true if the job was completed; otherwise false) $sys.problemDesc (String type, the problem description in case of execution failure) $sys.executionDatetime (Date type, The starting date and time of the execution) $sys.executionElapsedTime (Long type in milli-seconds. The duration of the execution)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: numberOfDays
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The number of days in the past for which to preserve expired logs. Logs created farther in the past will be purged. Defaults to 30 days if not specified.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: trashFolder
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The Folder that will contain the trash items. Must start with //Folders/

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: transitionNames
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of transition trigger names to attempt to transition items in trash folder to trash state

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: trashState
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the trash state

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: moveOrphans
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Should orphaned items be moved to trash folder true or false

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: orphanIsError
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Does the existence of orphans count as an error for notifications true or false

Extension.name: PSNavLandingPageGeneratorEffect
Extension.initParam: Adds a Landing Page of the specified type to the NavOn's Landing Page slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.ct
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the content type to be used as the landing page. This type must have default values for all required fields. Required, may not be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.title.template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies the string format to use for the title page

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.displaytitle.field
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies the name of the page to get the page title. May be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.displaytitle.format
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies the format of the display title

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.required.fields.names
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies a comma seperated list of required fields on the landing page type. May be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.required.fields.values
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies a comma seperated list of default values for corresponding field names. May be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: navon.landingpage.default.communityid
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Specifies the ID of the Community for the Landing Page. Defaults to the community of the Navon if not supplied.

Extension.name: psoSwitchCommunityWorkflowAction
Extension.initParam: This workflow action will switch the items Community to the Community specified by the "defaultCommunityName" custom property of the items containing folder. If the property is not found, this action will do nothing.

Extension.name: PSSetFieldOnSlottedItemEffect
Extension.initParam: Sets the configured field on the configured type to the configured value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: field_name
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The field to set the value on. Required, may not be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: valueIfEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The value to set the field to if the slot is empty. Optional, may be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: valueIfNotEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The value to set the field to if the slot is not empty. Optional, may be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot to check for contents.

Extension.name: PSOSetFieldOnSlottedItemTransform
Extension.initParam: Sets a field to the specified value if a slot on the item contains an entry.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: field_name
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The field to set the value on. Required, may not be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: valueIfEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The value to set the field to if the slot is empty. Optional, may be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: valueIfNotEmpty
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The value to set the field to if the slot is not empty. Optional, may be null or empty.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot to check for contents.
